name: screenbeard
message:
I'll kick this off.

Bloody Good Bloke: My bro Andy. Had his first kid in March, and turned into the worlds greatest dad and responsible adult overnight. Parenthood fits him like a glove. He's taking good care of his family, working hard, and managed to keep his kid alive for long enough for him to learn to crawl. All in all, a top effort! That's why my baby brother deserves an award.
